sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app>
      <NavBar />
      <v-container fluid class="paddingTop100 alignleft px-15">
        <v-col cols="lg-8">
        <v-stepper v-model="e1" alt-labels>
    <v-stepper-header>
      <v-stepper-step
        :complete="e1 > 1"
        step="1"
      >
        Meine Daten
      </v-stepper-step>

      <v-divider></v-divider>

      <v-stepper-step
        :complete="e1 > 2"
        step="2"
      >
        Zahlung
      </v-stepper-step>

      <v-divider></v-divider>

      <v-stepper-step step="3">
        Überprüfen
      </v-stepper-step>
      <v-divider></v-divider>

      <v-stepper-step step="4">
        Geschafft
      </v-stepper-step>
    </v-stepper-header>

    <v-stepper-items>
      <v-stepper-content step="1">
        <v-form class="mr-10">
            <v-row class="height80">
              <v-col cols="2">
                <v-select id="idAnrede"
                :items="anrede"
                label="Anrede"
                outlined
                rounded
        ></v-select>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
          <v-row class="height80">
            <v-col cols="6">
              <v-text-field
                v-model="name"
                :counter="10"
                :rules="nameRules"
                label="Vorname"
                required
                rounded outlined
              ></v-text-field>  
              
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6">
              <v-text-field
                v-model="name"
                :counter="10"
                :rules="nameRules"
                label="Nachname"
                required
                rounded outlined
              ></v-text-field>  
              
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
          <v-row>
            <v-col cols="12">
              <v-text-field
                v-model="name"
                :counter="10"
                :rules="nameRules"
                label="E-mail Adresse"
                required
                rounded outlined
              ></v-text-field>  
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
          <v-row>
            <v-col cols="4">
              <v-menu
        v-model="menu2"
        :close-on-content-click="false"
        :nudge-right="40"
        transition="scale-transition"
        offset-y
        min-width="auto"
      >
        <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
          <v-text-field
            v-model="date"
            label="Geburtsdatum"
            append-icon="mdi-calendar"
            readonly
            v-bind="attrs"
            v-on="on"
            rounded outlined
          ></v-text-field>
        </template>
        <v-date-picker
          v-model="date"
          @input="menu2 = false"
        ></v-date-picker>
      </v-menu>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
          </v-form>
        <v-btn
          color="primary"
          @click="e1 = 2"
        >
          Continue
        </v-btn>

        <v-btn text>
          Cancel
        </v-btn>
      </v-stepper-content>

      <v-stepper-content step="2">
        <v-card
          class="mb-12"
          color="grey lighten-1"
          height="200px"
        ></v-card>

        <v-btn
          color="primary"
          @click="e1 = 3"
        >
          Continue
        </v-btn>

        <v-btn text>
          Cancel
        </v-btn>
      </v-stepper-content>

      <v-stepper-content step="3">
        <v-card
          class="mb-12"
          color="grey lighten-1"
          height="200px"
        ></v-card>

        <v-btn
          color="primary"
          @click="e1 = 1"
        >
          Continue
        </v-btn>

        <v-btn text>
          Cancel
        </v-btn>
      </v-stepper-content>
    </v-stepper-items>
  </v-stepper>
</v-col>
      </v-container>
      </v-app>
</template>
<script>
  import NavBar from "../components/NavBar.vue";
  export default  {
    name: "checkoutView",
    data () {
      return {
        e1: 1,
      }
    },
    components: {
      NavBar,
    }}
</script>
<style>
.paddingTop100{
    margin-top: 100px;
}
.height80{
    height: 80px;
}
</style>
